item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome to Misty Path ðŸŒ¿, where I share my thoughts and works. I’m Mistyâ€¦ I’m a design learner ðŸŽ¨ who believes good design should be both functional and beautiful. Although this might sound like a clichÃ©, I understand the philosophy in my own way. To me, it’s about seamlessly integrating the function within the structure so that the purpose of the design is always clear and intuitive. It’s also about creating beautiful works while acknowledging that beauty can be subjective and everyone has their unique perspective.
